meanings.definition: Spread out over a large area
meanings.sent1: The diffused sunlight filled the entire room with a warm glow.
meanings.sent2: The diffused colors of the sunset painted the sky in a beautiful array.
meanings.sent3: The diffused scent of freshly baked cookies made everyone in the house hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her diffused laughter echoed through the halls, bringing smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent5: The diffused sound of birds chirping created a peaceful atmosphere in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The diffused clouds covered the sky in a patchy pattern.
meanings.sent2: The diffused crowd slowly dispersed after the event ended.
meanings.sent3: The diffused confetti made the celebration even more festive.
meanings.sent4: Her diffused thoughts wandered aimlessly, unable to focus on one thing.
meanings.sent5: The diffused leaves on the ground created a colorful carpet in the park.

meanings.sent1: His diffused attention caused him to miss important details in the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The diffused energy in the room made it hard to stay motivated.
meanings.sent3: The diffused effort put into the project resulted in a mediocre outcome.
meanings.sent4: Her diffused gaze wandered around the room, not settling on anything in particular.
meanings.sent5: The diffused focus of the discussion led to confusion among the participants.
